name: VRSnake
description:
Control a snake battle by moving your neck and head following doctors'guides



VRSnake Virtual Reality Edition: Classic fun snake snake out of virtual reality version! VRSnake, the same gameplay is different. You can exercise your cervical spine while playing the game. It is most suitable for office workers and you who are sitting in front of the computer for a long time. There are more interesting ways to play!
developers: 绍兴市托特科技有限公司
publishers: 绍兴市托特科技有限公司
